description:
Alex is a 19 year old college athlete (runner) who we met at a local movie theater where he works part-time to help pay for, what he calls, the 'party fund'.

He's a sophomore sport science major and says he wants to work for a major football team at some point as a personal trainer. He's in terrific shape, lean and mean... and once you get a load of what he's packing inside of his pants, you'll understand what we mean.

Enjoy Alex as he enjoys himself in three scenes before he explodes in a fantastic finish to a long day at school and work.
title: Alex
